anpl:
def main(input_grid: np.ndarray) -> np.ndarray:
    output_grid = "Create a 6x3 image matrix"()
    output_grid = "Assign input_grid to the top half of output_grid"(output_grid, input_grid)
    input_grid = "Flip input_grid upside down"(input_grid)
    output_grid = "Assign input_grid to the bottom half of output_grid"(output_grid, input_grid)
    return output_grid
name: 8be77c9e.json

description.object: In the input, you should see...3x3 grid with some squares filled with the same color and the rest filled with black
description.size: The output grid size...double the height of the input grid and the same width as the input grid
description.description: To make the output, you have to...mirror the grid on the new grid
